import React from "react"; import IngredienstList from "./IngredientsList"; export default function Recipe(props) { const {name,cookTime,servings,instructions,ingredients}=props; return (

{name}

Cook Time: {cookTime}
Servings: {servings}
Instructions:
{instructions}

); }
